name: Ode to Escher
description: Ode2Esher is a compilation of New York City buildings. While experimenting with cut up pieces of my photographs previously taken of New York buildings, the series emerged. Using cut and paste tools I threw together different geometrical configurations . After finalizing the design I used the dodge and burn tools for tone and balance. There are over ten in the series. Printed with archival Chromium ink printed on Hahnemühle photo rag. Sizes are:  Ode2Escher is a finalist in three juried group shows recently.  103rd Annual Blenheim Show, Greenwich Art Society 2020  Stamford Artist Society, Member Show 2021  41st Annual Photography Juried Show /Carriage Barn 2021  3rd Place Grey Cube Gallery London England 2021
